TextEng: "Silence! I did not raise you to hear you prattle on!"
Text: "입 닥쳐! 네 주절거림을 듣자고 살린 게 아냐!"

TextEng: "I would expect more thanks for bringing you back from the dead."
"You should not be so disrespectful of the devout."
Text: "신앙심 깊은 이에게 그렇게 무례해선 안 돼."

TextEng: "What's important is that I just brought you back from the dead."
Text: "중요한 건 내가 방금 너를 되살렸다는 거야."

TextEng: "Do I? You were part of that group back at the inn, right?"
"I should. You were with that group I talked to in the inn."
Text: "그래야지. 넌 여관에서 내가 얘기한 그 일행이었잖아."

TextEng: "Don't you remember who I am? We spoke at the inn."
Text: "내가 누군지 기억 안 나? 여관에서 얘기했잖아."

TextEng: "Perhaps dying again would jog your memory."
"What are you going to do, now?"
"Don't you wonder what happened to the rest of your group?"
Text: "나머지 일행에게 무슨 일이 일어났는지 궁금하지 않아?"

TextEng: "Does it really matter? I'm not here to rescue any of you."
Text: "그게 중요해? 너희를 구하러 온 게 아니야."

TextEng: "I found her, yes, and sent her back to the inn."
"I found her, yes, but she's dead. Just as you were."
"I found a rakshasa pretending to be her."
"What are you going to do, now?"
"So how did the drow catch you?"
"So where are these slaves you mention?"
"I found her with some slaves. She's determined to help them."
Text: "노예들이랑 같이 있는 걸 찾았어. 그들을 돕겠다더라."
